typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string ('4')
}
source(output(
		{Item Code\nرقم الصنف} as string,
		{Barcode\nالباركود} as string,
		{Product Name Arabic\nاسم الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Description Arabic\nوصف الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Product Name Arabic\nاسم الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Description Arabic\nوصف الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Unit Item Barcode\nالباركود للوحدة } as string,
		{No Of Unit Items\nعدد الوحدات} as string,
		{Unit Weight/size\nوزن/سعة الوحدة} as string,
		{Unit UOM\nوحدة القياس} as string,
		{Package UOM\nوحدة قياس الحزمة-التغليف} as string,
		{Cost Price\nسعر التكلفة} as string,
		{Selling Price\nسعر البيع} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark English\nاسم العلامة التجارية انجليزى} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark Arabic\nاسم العلامة التجارية عربى} as string,
		{MoCI Product Group\nالمجموعة السلعية - بالوزارة} as string,
		{Country of Oragen Name\nاسم بلد المنشأ} as string,
		{Country of Oragen ISO\nكود 3 لبلد المنشأ} as string,
		{HS Code\nرمز المنسق الجمركي} as string,
		{Supplier CR\nرقم السجل التجارى للمورد} as string,
		{Supplier Name\nاسم المورد} as string,
		{Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 1} as string,
		{Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 2} as string,
		{Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 3} as string,
		{Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 4} as string,
		{Width\nالعرض} as string,
		{Height\nالطول} as string,
		{Depth\nالارتفاع} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> processingxlsx
processingxlsx derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		BARCODE as string,
		PRODUCT_NAME_ARABIC as string,
		DESCRIPTION_ARABIC as string,
		PRODUCT_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		DESCRIPTION_ENGLISH as string,
		UNIT_ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		NO_OF_UNIT_ITEMS as string,
		UNIT_WEIGHT_SIZE as string,
		UNIT_UOM as string,
		PACKAGE_UOM as string,
		COST_PRICE as string,
		SELLING_PRICE as string,
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ENGLISH as string,
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ARABIC as string,
		MOCI_PRODUCT_GROUP as string,
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_NAME as string,
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_ISO as string,
		HS_CODE as string,
		SUPPLIER_CR as string,
		SUPPLIER_NAME as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_1 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_2 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_3 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_4 as string,
		WIDTH as string,
		HEIGHT as string,
		DEPTH as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILEDATE as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ITEM_CODE = {Item Code\nرقم الصنف},
		BARCODE = {Barcode\nالباركود},
		PRODUCT_NAME_ARABIC = {Product Name Arabic\nاسم الصنف عربى},
		DESCRIPTION_ARABIC = {Description Arabic\nوصف الصنف عربى},
		PRODUCT_NAME_ENGLISH = {Product Name Arabic\nاسم الصنف انجليزى},
		DESCRIPTION_ENGLISH = {Description Arabic\nوصف الصنف انجليزى},
		UNIT_ITEM_BARCODE = {Unit Item Barcode\nالباركود للوحدة },
		NO_OF_UNIT_ITEMS = {No Of Unit Items\nعدد الوحدات},
		UNIT_WEIGHT_SIZE = {Unit Weight/size\nوزن/سعة الوحدة},
		UNIT_UOM = {Unit UOM\nوحدة القياس},
		PACKAGE_UOM = {Package UOM\nوحدة قياس الحزمة-التغليف},
		COST_PRICE = {Cost Price\nسعر التكلفة},
		SELLING_PRICE = {Selling Price\nسعر البيع},
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ENGLISH = {Brand-Trade Mark English\nاسم العلامة التجارية انجليزى},
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ARABIC = {Brand-Trade Mark Arabic\nاسم العلامة التجارية عربى},
		MOCI_PRODUCT_GROUP = {MoCI Product Group\nالمجموعة السلعية - بالوزارة},
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_NAME = {Country of Oragen Name\nاسم بلد المنشأ},
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_ISO = {Country of Oragen ISO\nكود 3 لبلد المنشأ},
		HS_CODE = {HS Code\nرمز المنسق الجمركي},
		SUPPLIER_CR = {Supplier CR\nرقم السجل التجارى للمورد},
		SUPPLIER_NAME = {Supplier Name\nاسم المورد},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_1 = {Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 1},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_2 = {Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 2},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_3 = {Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 3},
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_4 = {Category Level 1\nتصنيف السلعة 4},
		WIDTH = {Width\nالعرض},
		HEIGHT = {Height\nالطول},
		DEPTH = {Depth\nالارتفاع},
		ID_SK = SK_ID_SUR,
		DS_FILENAME = STG_FILENAME,
		DT_FILEDATE = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgProducts
